policies.name: Default Policy
policies.description: A policy that grants access only for users within this realm

config.code:
// by default, grants any permission associated with this policy
$evaluation.grant();

policies.name: Admin Policy
policies.description: Policy that grants access only for users within admin role

policies.name: Operator Policy
policies.description: Policy that grants access only for users within operator role

policies.name: User Policy
policies.description: Policy that grants access only for users within user role

policies.name: Default Permission
policies.description: A permission that applies to the default resource type

policies.name: product-create
policies.description: A permission that applies to the product resource with scope create resource

policies.name: product-delete
policies.description: A permission that applies to the product resource with scope delete resource

policies.name: product-edit
policies.description: A permission that applies to the product resource with scope edit resource

policies.name: product-view
policies.description: A permission that applies to the product resource with scope view resource

clientScopes.name: roles
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add user roles to the access token

clientScopes.name: web-origins
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add allowed web origins to the access token
